title: The size of the riser in the non-residential buildings over 32 m
clause_text: The size of the riser in the non-residential buildings over 32 m. high shall be 15 cm. (internal dia.) with twin hydrant outlets and hose reel on each floor.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The size of the riser in the non-residential buildings over 32 m. high shall be 15 cm. (internal dia.) with twin hydrant outlets and hose reel on each floor.
